name: places/ChIJoe77rL1YwokRi2UxcpFsdYk
formattedAddress: 1242 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1242 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10028-1407, USA

originalText.text:
I have been getting highlights for 20 years and this is the worst experience I have ever had. Upon arrival I told them I wanted to try bayalage and they told me my hair already was bayalage and then instead proceeded to place foils in my hair. I probably should have stopped the process there but I was a bit confused about what was going on and thought perhaps they were transitioning between the two.

The color: A full head of highlights took an hour and 40 minutes to place. The process was remarkably slow in comparison to the usual 40 minutes I am accustomed to. Afterwards my hair was streaky, orange, with persistent dark roots (see photos). It looks entirely unnatural and nothing like the photos I presented them with. I communicated this to them and they offered to fix it but the process took so long I had to leave.

The cut: The right side is longer than the left overall an Asymmetric haircut.

The blowout: The technique used to blow out my hair was archaic. No products were  placed in my hair to protect it and the stylist proceeded to scorch my hair and fry it- inevitably causing severe damage. A portion of my scalp also burned in the process and a day later it remains red, painful, and is starting to peel.

The Cost: My friend who has been going to this salon for years told me she pays $65 for a haircut and $200 for her highlights. I received a bill for $410- $290 for highlights and $120 for a cut. I questioned this and they insisted it was the correct amount. After tip I paid $500 for the worst hair experience I have ever had. Why I received a much higher price than my friend is unclear and the team was unwilling to explain this to me.

Customer service: The staff was actually quite kind and willing to fix the issues. However given the fiat pricing and the terrible hair color and scalp burning I elected not to return to have my hair fixed.

Overall: Horrible, hideous unnatural coloring that took an excessively long amount of time to do. The process was physically painful with damage occurring to my hair and scalp. Avoid this salon at all costs.

originalText.text: Moscow is the very best. He’s been doing my hair for over 20 years. Believe me, you won’t be disappointed.  I don’t trust no one else with my hair. Everywhere he goes, I’m there. Thank you Moscow from one of your VIP’s.

text.text: Moscow is the very best. He’s been doing my hair for over 20 years. Believe me, you won’t be disappointed.  I don’t trust no one else with my hair. Everywhere he goes, I’m there. Thank you Moscow from one of your VIP’s.

originalText.text: Mosco had to do a hair makeover for me since my highlights grew out, roots showing, hair got oxidized and overprocessed.  Had highlights, lowlights, and toner to even color and give a more natural look. Worth a trip because I live out of town and this used to be my place!!

originalText.text: Extremely friendly service. Very convenient. Prices are reasonable and the line is short. Call early to book an appointment.

originalText.text: Amazing experience very clean, very happy with the results, very kind and helpful people I would give 10 stars if I could
